/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the urban landscape. The street, lined with lush green trees, stretches out into the distance, flanked by buildings on both sides. The buildings, predominantly white and gray, rise up to meet the clear blue sky. A few clouds are scattered across the sky, adding depth to the expansive vista. The perspective of the image is from the left side of the street, looking towards the right, giving a sense of depth and scale to the scene. The colors in the image are vibrant, with the green of the trees contrasting beautifully with the blue of the sky and the gray and white of the buildings. The image is a beautiful representation of urban life in Beijing, capturing the city's architectural charm and natural beauty.
